events.name: Experienced Hero for Hire
events.effect: You may recruit a resolve 6 hero for 20 shards.

events.name: From Beyond
events.effect: You get a choice of 1 of 3 random heroes from your graveyard to resurrect. The resurrected hero will keep their resolve level, but their skills, armour and weapon will be lost.

events.name: Brigand Incursion
events.effect: Triggers Plot Quest: Wolves at the Door, a lvl 6 mission involving fighting bandits attempting to raid the town lead by their leader, The Vvulf. There are three potential Ancestor's Knapsacks available on the map.

events.name: A Thief in the Night
events.effect: "The Shrieker has stolen 8 of your Trinkets!"Triggers Plot Quest: your party fights the Shrieker and attempt to gain the treasures it has collected from you. Should your heroes survive, the trinkets will be given as Quest Rewards after choosing to return to the Hamlet.

events.name: Shrieker's Prize
events.effect: Triggers Plot Quest: Shrieker's Prize, a mission in the Weald where your party fights the Horrid Shrieker and attempt to gain the treasures it has collected.

events.name: A Maddening Whine
events.effect: Triggers Plot Quest: Burn the Hives, a mission in The Courtyard. This event only appears on week 3, and only occurs once.

events.name: The Town is Abuzz!
events.effect: Stress reduction activities in town are slightly less effective. Only triggers if the quest "Burn the Hives" is not completed after it becomes available. This event will keep repeating unless a priority event occurs (such as Blood Scourge) or "Burn the Hives" is completed.

events.name: Heresy in the Blood
events.effect: Triggers The Fanatic to spawn if at least two of your heroes who enter the next dungeon have the Crimson Curse. 20% chance with 2-3 heroes, 75% chance with 4.

events.name: A Veil Lifted
events.effect: Removes the Crimson Curse from all affected heroes. This event only occurs after beating the Baron, Viscount or Countess

events.name: They Made a Tonic
events.effect: For 30 shards every hero in the roster has 1 diseased cured. This also applies to the Crimson Curse.

events.name: Crystaline Focii
events.effect: For 30 shards every hero in the roster heals 50 stress.
